s.text: Marches, speeches, and letter writing were all employed to help stimulate the Campaign and rally the people.
People became excited and waited for the mills to reappear, but they never did.
People became excited and waited for the mills to reappear, but they never did.
Rather than sit back and wait for their jobs to be snatched away, the workers and local union members in the mills fought long and hard to be able to keep the factories open.
People became excited and waited for the mills to reappear, but they never did.
People became excited and waited for the mills to reappear, but they never did.
Rather than sit back and wait for their jobs to be snatched away, the workers and local union members in the mills fought long and hard to be able to keep the factories open.
People became excited and waited for the mills to reappear, but they never did.
People became excited and waited for the mills to reappear, but they never did.
Rather than sit back and wait for their jobs to be snatched away, the workers and local union members in the mills fought long and hard to be able to keep the factories open.
People became excited and waited for the mills to reappear, but they never did.
People became excited and waited for the mills to reappear, but they never did.
Rather than sit back and wait for their jobs to be snatched away, the workers and local union members in the mills fought long and hard to be able to keep the factories open.

Even though they eventually failed, the fact that they tried to preserve what they felt belonged to them is an amazing example of how far people will go to save their lives and the futures of their children.
The steel workers who tried to save their jobs and their lives were part of something greater than themselves, something which would endure long after they had moved away and moved on.

Rather than try and come up with some sort of scenario, the USWA simply ignored what was going on in Youngstown, hoping that perhaps the problem would resolve itself, or at least not spread any further than it already had.
